articles.content: With just 20 days away from IPL 2024, Virat Kohli’s Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) is all set to clash with MS Dhoni’s Chennai Super Kings (CSK). However, the absence of Virat in the Test series a… [+1269 chars]
